content: You caught a ton of fish today, but it seems you don't have one of these <color=#8AAB4B>{奖励鱼}</color>. Well, now you do!
info: 功能对话-玩家行为奖励-1008热贝尔_功能对话

content:
You've been mining rocks all day?!
Can't believe you didn't come ask me,
I know where all the rocks are!
info: 功能对话-玩家行为奖励-1008热贝尔_功能对话

content:
What's your beef with the beach crabs?
Caught a whole bunch today, huh?
Here, add this <color=#8AAB4B>{奖励赶海生物}</color> to your collection too.
info: 功能对话-玩家行为奖励-1008热贝尔_功能对话

content:
Wood takes time to grow, you know,
And you chopped down quite a lot today...
Though come to think of it, stones grow even slower.
info: 功能对话-玩家行为奖励-1008热贝尔_功能对话

content:
I noticed you've been going in and out of the Station all day.
Were you visiting that place
with the special ore nearby?
info: 功能对话-玩家行为奖励-1008热贝尔_功能对话

content: You've been catching bugs all day. Here, take this <color=#8AAB4B>{奖励虫}</color>. It'll get you even more hooked!
info: 功能对话-玩家行为奖励-1008热贝尔_功能对话

content:
Are you desperately in need of wood?
Looking for something oddly shaped or perfectly round?
No? Then why'd you chop so much today?
info: 功能对话-玩家行为奖励-1008热贝尔_功能对话

content: Never mind, take all this <color=#8AAB4B>{奖励木材}</color>. If you need more, just let me know!
info: 功能对话-玩家行为奖励-1008热贝尔_功能对话

content:
Let's pack this <color=#8AAB4B>{奖励赶海生物}</color> together,
I couldn't help but catch it when I was putting up the "No Sea Blasting" sign last time.
info: 功能对话-玩家行为奖励-1008热贝尔_功能对话

content:
Here, take this <color=#8AAB4B>{奖励矿石}</color>,
I'll go break a few dozen more for you right now...
info: 功能对话-玩家行为奖励-1008热贝尔_功能对话

Take this <color=#8AAB4B>{奖励流光瓶}</color>,

info: 功能对话-玩家行为奖励-1008热贝尔_功能对话

content: How many fish did you catch today! Planning a fish feast? Here, have this <color=#8AAB4B>{奖励鱼}</color>, consider it my entry ticket.
info: 功能对话-玩家行为奖励-1008热贝尔_功能对话

content:
Later I found out I didn't need that many branches after all.
Since you've been shaking trees all day,
why don't you keep them?
info: 功能对话-玩家行为奖励-1008热贝尔_功能对话

content:
I was just sitting here spacing out,
and I heard the car that just dropped you off leave four or five times.
Here, take this <color=#8AAB4B>{奖励流光瓶}</color>, bhan!
info: 功能对话-玩家行为奖励-1008热贝尔_功能对话

Take it, bhan!

content:
